SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Level.LevelManager

Class UserInputManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Level.LevelManager.UserInputManager
public class UserInputManager extends Object
Manages user input for controlling the player's plane and handling interactions such as movement, shooting, and pausing the game.

      Parameters:
      user - the user plane that will respond to input
      root - the root group in which projectiles will be added
      userProjectiles - a list to keep track of the user's projectiles
      pauseMenuManager - the pause menu manager to handle game pausing

      private boolean isMouseInsidePlane(double mouseX, double mouseY)
      Checks if the mouse pointer is inside the user plane hitbox.
      Parameters:
      mouseX - the x-coordinate of the mouse
      mouseY - the y-coordinate of the mouse
      Returns:
      true if the mouse is inside the plane's bounds, false otherwise

    • setPaused

      public void setPaused(boolean paused)
      Sets the paused state and disables/enables user interactions accordingly.
      Parameters:
      paused - true to pause the game, false to resume

    • fireProjectile

      private void fireProjectile()
      Fires a projectile from the user plane if the game is not paused and the cooldown has passed. This method checks if the game is paused or if a cooldown period is active. If either condition is true, it returns early and does not fire a projectile. If neither condition is met, it triggers the user's plane to fire projectiles, adds them to the game root for rendering, and starts a cooldown period to prevent rapid firing. It also plays the shoot sound effect.

    • startCooldown

      private void startCooldown()
      Starts the cooldown timer to prevent continuous firing of projectiles.

    • handleMouseMiddleClick
